text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: …… Nine-ball pool isn't a game where you just have to pocket the nine in.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: It's also a match… to see who can keep their turn the longest without making mistakes.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Basically, always keep the lead on your opponent. Simple and clear, isn't it?
